content:
Over the past 24 hours, Russian troops fired at the territory of 10 regions of Ukraine, 129 settlements have been enemy attacks.

About thisReportsMilitary Media Center.

"In total, 129 settlements and 143 infrastructure facilities were attacked from various types of weapons — mortars, tanks, artillery, MLRS, UAVs, air defense systems, tactical aviation," the report says.

Among the civilian population are dead and injured, the number of victims is clarified.

As reportedArmyinform, the enemy fired at the Bugaivka in Kharkiv region: there are wounded.
title: Shelling of Ukraine: per day the enemy attacked 129 settlements
description: This was reported by the Military Media Center.    "In general, mortars are used from different types of weapons,...
author: Army Inform
